file_content.text: The Empire will think twice before relying on battle droids again.
I just ran a full diagnostic on our droids--looks like they've all been infected.
They won't go ballistic until they've been shipped and deployed, but when they do... watch out, Imperials.
This wouldn't have happened without your help. The Republic doesn't realize what you've done for them.
Don't forget your part. You acted in spite of their distrust.
I had to do something. Otherwise, I really would be the Imperial scum they think I am.
Yeah, I'm trying to do my part, too... even if I have to put up with some nasty looks.
Will you continue working at the factory?
Assuming the Empire doesn't shut the factory down once those droids go haywire, yeah, I'll probably keep working there.
So long as the Republic thinks I'm a traitor, the Empire will, too. Might as well stick around, do some more damage.
Make sure you infect all of the relay droids. We want that virus to spread as much as possible.
I can't help the Republic if they won't even listen to me.
